title: Palestinian woman starts business to keep six-member family afloat
content: Hanan al-Madhoun, a 36-year-old Palestinian woman, makes figures and decorations for selling ahead of the Islamic holy month of Ramadan in Gaza City, April 11, 2021. Hanan has started her own business six years ago to keep her six-member family afloat amid the economic deterioration. (Photo by Rizek Abdeljawad/Xinhua)
